name: Staff Software Engineer (С#)
description:
We are currently looking for a Staff Software Engineer, someone versatile and enthusiastic to take on new challenges as we continue to push technology forward. This is a great opportunity to build on your experience as a skilled, passionate, innovative engineer, architect, fluent communicator and commercial product driver with a track record for delivery, quality and innovation.

Duties and responsibilities:

  • Be involved in full product lifecycle including requirements gathering, designing, developing, testing, deployment and adjusting product support procedures

  • Contribute individually and align team members to develop high-quality products

  • Provide direction and mentoring to others, drive a team of highly experienced and similarly qualified engineers

  • Play a key role in setting up and executing tech excellence strategy

  • Build, review and support key design solutions

Qualifications & experience:

  • 7+ year experience in C#, expert knowledge of .Net Core platform or .Net Framework + ASP.NET MVC/WebAPI

  • Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience

  • Design Patterns, SOLID and PoEAA are your handy tools

  • You are sure that Micro-service architecture is not only about micro-services connected with the service buses. You know typical service roles, responsibilities and interactions. You know what micro-service hell means and how to avoid it

  • You know how to build secured applications

  • You know how to build high-performance applications and enjoy tuning their performance and resource usage

  • Solid knowledge in data structures and algorithms

  • Natively speak SQL, know-how SQL server stores data, indexes and logs. You don't panic once you have seen a mazy query plan

  • Enjoy working in a product-oriented agile-like environment with a target focus on both delivery and quality

  • Solid experience working with modern frontend frameworks like Vue, Angular and React, know their approaches, weaknesses and strengths

  • Know how to build docker containers and debug containerized applications

  • Have excellent communication skills, specifically when finding the best approach and convincing others to follow it

  • Are ready to work in international teams with English as the default language, with good written and spoken skills

It would be great if you are:

  • A proven influencer, you have publications in software engineering or computer science areas, or you are a professional conference speaker or user group leader

  • A significant contributor to a popular open-source project

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • 100% remote work, flexible schedule
  • Co-working fees are reimbursed by the company
  • International company, English is the primary communication language
  • Health insurance including kids under 14
  • Subsidy of home office expenses or lunch (once the office work is reinstated)

IMPORTANT: we are certain it's hard to meet everything we mentioned. Please send us your CV even if you match a significant part of the requirements and are ready to grow.

We are currently looking for a Staff Software Engineer, someone versatile and enthusiastic to take on new challenges as we continue to push technology forward. ООО "Алемира Рисерч" представляет бренд SIT
